game.name: Mage & Maze
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Join this great wizard (or not-so-great) on his journey to find the exit of a mysterious dungeon in Mage & Maze.
